## Events.Click.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Click` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(opt_block?: Block | null, opt_workspaceId?: string | null, opt_targetType?: ClickTarget);
```

opt\_block


</td><td>

[Block](./blockly.block_class.md) \| null


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The affected block. Null for click events that do not have an associated block (i.e. workspace click). Undefined for a blank event.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

opt\_workspaceId


</td><td>

string \| null


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The workspace identifier for this event. Not used if block is passed. Undefined for a blank event.


</td></tr>

opt\_targetType


</td><td>

[ClickTarget](./blockly.events_namespace.clicktarget_enum.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The type of element targeted by this click event. Undefined for a blank event.
